name: The Umberdred Institute for Emerging Evildoers
name_original: The Umberdred Institute for Emerging Evildoers
description:
An Amble Studio Remix

In Umberdred's, tell silly stories about how aspiring villains accept unlikely quests to earn dubious certifications in evildoing skills.

Play now on Story Synth!

The Umberdred Institute for Emerging Evildoers is a fully-accredited, private institution dedicated to sowing mayhem around the world. Attendees earn their certifications by going on quests and demonstrating competency in their skills.

Improvise short stories about these aspiring villains and see if they succeed!

The Umberdred Institute for Emerging Evildoers is a hack of Randy and Greg Lubin's Aethelred's Academy, and was created for the Story Synth Summer Jam.

Info
  • 2+ players
  • All ages
  • Play time: from 5 minutes to a 5 year Diploma of Evil Studies
  • Genre: Fantasy
  • Tone: Comedy

Play now for free, or donate below and hit 'download' to play! Every penny goes towards causing more chaos making more great games!

To learn more about Amble Studio, visit our website!
